title: Burning

Takes additional 1d4Fire damage for the duration.

Burning is a Status Effect in Baldur's Gate 3. Status Effects are the different conditions that can affect characters in both positive and negative ways.

Baldur's Gate 3 Burning Information

Effect: Takes additional Fire damage for the duration. Burning deals 1d4 Fire damage per turn. Immune if Wet.
